tool_description: Audits imaging procedures against established protocols and regulatory requirements to ensure compliance.

protocol_id.description: Protocol identifier used for the study

audit_scope.description: Scope of audit: technical, safety, regulatory, complete

error_messages: Invalid study ID: The specified study ID does not exist.
Invalid protocol ID: The specified protocol ID is not found.
Audit scope not supported: Use one of [technical, safety, regulatory, complete].
Insufficient audit data: Not enough data available to complete the audit.
Protocol violation detected: The study does not comply with the specified protocol.
usage: Provide study_id and protocol_id to audit compliance. Optionally specify audit_scope to focus the audit.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, partial
